1.title: Visiblement Vendredi
1.plot: On the set of the talk show Visiblement Vendredi, Sylvain The Magnificent reserves a surprising offer from the host; Patrick Mathieu. During that, his rival Barloute l'Étonnant tries to remember his fame.

2.title: Portes ouvertes
2.plot: At a restaurant, Sylvain discusses his future with his agent Marc. Léa begins her employment as a real-estate agent and Sylvain receives a surprising call.

3.title: Un ami magique
3.plot: Sylvain lends a hand to Léa. He tries to approach her, but she declines and invites him out. During this time, a mysterious man appears in town.

4.title: Une soirée d'enchantement sans pareil
4.plot: At Patrick Mathieu's party; Sylvain and Marc talk with Barloute and his agent Bernard. Léa introduces her new boyfriend Jug Thibodeau-a BMX champion.

5.title: Marc Séguin
5.plot: The party is in full swing. Sylvain is trying to talk to Léa and invites her to the Patrick Mathieu's party. Barloute will attempt to make a comeback.

6.title: Vikgrab Morsuul
6.plot: Sylvain has breakfast with Marc. With Bernard, they go to watch Jugs competition at the Olympic Stadium. Barloute meets an admirer.

7.title: Un vrai professionnel de BMX
7.plot: Sylvain meets with the media. Léa and Bernard go to visit Jug. Barloute is about to depart on an exotic trip to a far off destination.

8.title: Une place qui s'appelle le Douzebékistan
8.plot: Bernard completely let down, asks for help from Sylvain. Here, he decides to bring order to his life and goes to see Léa. Surprised to see Sylvain alone with Bernard, Marc follows them.

imdb.plot outline: Sylvan Le Magnifique is a dramatic comedy web-series that follows the adventures of Sylvain Le Magnifique; a well known Quebecois magician-who is actually a real magician. Sylvain is a cynic, and is disillusioned with his profession and celebrity status. Season 1 begins with Sylvain's life upside down. HIs emotional life is an unhappy one, he wishes he had put more effort into his relationship with Léa; his ex-who he still have some sort of relationship with. Should he fire his incompetent agent, yet only friend Marc?
imdb.title: Sylvain Le Magnifique
plot: Sylvain, the Magnificent is a well known Quebec magician-who actually has real magical powers. Cynical and disillusioned with his profession and celebrity stature, Sylvain is lost. His love life is miserable, the competition with his rival, the Great Barloute, does not stimulate him anymore. Through all this questioning, the arrival of a mysterious stranger risks upsetting many things in his life .

Sylvan Le Magnifique is a dramatic comedy web-series that follows the adventures of _Sylvain Le Magnifique_ (qv); a well known Quebecois magician-who is actually a real magician. Sylvain is a cynic, and is disillusioned with his profession and celebrity status. Season 1 begins with Sylvain's life upside down. HIs emotional life is an unhappy one, he wishes he had put more effort into his relationship with Léa; his ex-who he still have some sort of relationship with. Should he fire his incompetent agent, yet only friend Marc?
